txt.en: 'Dark creatures have come to hunt these woods. Even now they threaten to overwhelm us.'
'Even this place of dreams is no longer safe. Prepare yourself, mortal!'
'The forest yet endures, thanks to you, [placeholder]. Return to the Huntsman's Hall with pride.'
Munfaeril has bidden you challenge an ancient spirit as a test of endurance in the Wild Hunt that the Huntsman has set before you.

'I have seen you stand fast and endure what many could not. I cannot say that you will survive what lies before you unbowed, but you are prepared.\n\n'Now return to your place in the world lest you become lost in dreams.'
The ox-spirit has set before you a challenge of endurance. You must both survive against the waves of crushing despair before you.
As you lean down and drink from the pool, strange visions dance before your eyes, and the odd mist that had fallen upon the forest begins to lift.
Having faced your challenge and emerged unbowed, you may now return to the waking world through the waters of the pool.

'Welcome, little [placeholder]. You are prepared to endure the crashing waves of brutal fate?

'They come even now as a howling fury in the night. Jaws that would tear and crush, heartless as the darkest moon.

'Stand ready!'
Instance: The Wild Hunt -- Munfaeril's Spirit
